summary: Successfully integrated real Wolf Table library into Test 2 screen with complete functionality. Installed @wolf-table/table package, implemented dynamic loading to avoid SSR issues, and created exact replica of user's provided code with all features: scrollable, resizable, selectable, editable, copyable, cell freezing, merging, borders, formulas, and custom styling. Added interactive buttons for real-time manipulation and status indicator. Table loads with company data and demonstrates all advanced spreadsheet capabilities.
current_status: Real Wolf Table fully working with all requested features. Canvas-based rendering operational with formula support, cell merging, borders, and styling. Interactive controls allow runtime modification of table structure and content. Ready for full testing and production use.
